or just after a holiday but the truth is
that no particular date on the calendar
is more special than another Monday
isn't better than Wednesday and January
1st isn't any better than March 13th the
only thing special about these days and
dates is the idea of worth that we've
placed on them and while it's good to
take full advantage of this Fresh Start
effect it's counterproductive to tie
ourselves so strongly to them that we
don't make the changes we need until we
get a fresh start so if you've already
fallen short of your goals you don't
have to wait for next year to start
again because today is as good as any to
start again
